translation.en: You have to let me take her,
but not for me, for her.
translation.ja: 僕のためじゃなく象のためだ

translation.en: All this time, I've tried to win the elephant to find my family,
translation.ja: 象が僕の妹を 探してくれると思ってた

translation.en: but she has a family and she was taken from them.
translation.ja: でも象にも家族がいるんだ

translation.en: The elephant might have a sister too.
I know the joke didn't work,
translation.ja: 課題はクリアできなかった

translation.en: but please, the elephant didn't ask to be brought here.
translation.ja: でも象を 自由にしてあげてください

translation.en: We have to send her home.
No, no, no, no, no, no.
translation.ja: いいや　それはダメだ

translation.en: You had one last thing to do, and I don't see her laughing.
translation.ja: 課題をクリアできなかった 夫人は笑ってないだろ

translation.en: Grab the elephant and we'll roll.
Okay, I know. This is impossible.
translation.ja: こんなのありえないわよね

translation.en: Think of all of the impossible things you've done, and you've probably done plenty.
translation.ja: あなたも不可能なことを 実現させたことがあるはず

translation.en: Have you ever gotten through one of them alone?
translation.ja: それを可能にしたのは

translation.en: Of course not. That would be absurd.
translation.ja: あなた一人の力じゃない

translation.en: Peter fought and flew and defied a king,
translation.ja: ピーターは２つの難題を
１人で成しとげたと思ってる

translation.en: All right, kid, you did it.
But… but it was the elephant.
She's laughing, right? That's all I really wanted.
translation.ja: 夫人が笑ったからいいんだよ

translation.en: Things are only impossible till they're not.
translation.ja: 物事が不可能なのは 成しとげるまでだ
すばらしい勝利だ おめでとう

translation.en: We did it! We did it!
translation.ja: ついに成しとげたんだ

translation.en: How will we get her home?
Carried over the mountains by larger elephants!
translation.ja: もっと大きな象に 乗せて帰そう

translation.en: That seemed good until I said it out loud.
This boy says the elephant must go home.
translation.ja: 象を故郷に帰してあげて

translation.en: You've seen what happens when I attempt that spell.
translation.ja: 私の魔法を見たでしょう？

translation.en: Sir, the elephant deserves to be with her family.
translation.ja: でも象は家族と 一緒にいるべきです

translation.en: Yeah, that's a lovely idea, but look around you.
translation.ja: それはそのとおりだが この部屋をご覧よ

translation.en: - You brought an elephant through the roof. -
translation.ja: あなたが象を出したのよ

translation.en: And don't you realize it started something here?
translation.ja: それに世界は変わってきたと 思わない？

translation.en: The very thing you wished for.
translation.ja: あなたが望んだようにね

translation.en: Hey, magic man! Let's send the big lady home!
translation.ja: おーい 魔術師 象を家に帰してやろう

translation.en: I believe that you can perform the necessary magic.
translation.ja: きっと魔法はうまくいくはず

translation.en: I believe that only you can set things right.
translation.ja: あなたならできると 信じてます

translation.en: In my dream, I was meant to follow her.
translation.ja: 夢の中で象を追ってたの

translation.en: I do not believe in dreams.
translation.ja: 私は夢なんて信じないわ

translation.en: Yes, I do, in fact, believe in dreams.
translation.ja: そうね　実を言うと信じてる
戦いには加わらなきゃな

translation.en: I heard it was different here before.
translation.ja: この街は変わってしまった

translation.en: There was light, there was life, there was hope.
translation.ja: 昔は光と希望に 満ちあふれてたのに…

translation.en: The perfect kind of town to make an elephant disappear.
translation.ja: 今なら象を魔法で 消すことができるはず

translation.en: It's hard to lose a friend.
translation.ja: 友達を失うのはつらい

translation.en: We have to say goodbye now.
and I believe that he can send her home!
translation.ja: だから象を送り返すことも できるはず

translation.en: That is how it will be accomplished.
translation.ja: 魔法は必ず成功します

translation.en: Belief is a great and invisible thing.
It comes over us like sleep.
fighting it for reasons we cannot name…
translation.ja: ひっそりと迫ってくる

translation.en: until, as with sleep, we lose ourselves.
translation.ja: そしていつの間にか 包まれている

translation.en: We stop… and we are restored.
translation.ja: そして私たちは 活力を取り戻すのだ

translation.en: I can't believe I just saw magic!
- What's happening? - Look at the clouds!
- What is it? - It's sun, my darling.
You were meant to follow her to your destiny.
translation.ja: 象を追いかけるのは 諦めたの？

translation.en: Come on now, Adele. Time to go home.
translation.ja: アデル 帰りましょう

translation.en: This is… this is my sister.
- First of all-- Let me just say-- - You're alive! And here!
translation.ja: 君は… 生きていたんだね

translation.en: I'm sorry for the harm I've caused you, madam.
translation.ja: ケガをさせて すみません
ありがとう　魔術師さん

translation.en: Just look at the place now.
translation.ja: 今の街を見てちょうだい

translation.en: A town restored. Can you see?
translation.ja: すっかり元に戻ったわ

translation.en: You've been visiting for a while.
I know, but every time I try to leave,
translation.ja: ああ 帰ろうとするたびに
面白いことが起きるから 帰れないのだ

translation.en: Just then, the magic coral woke up
translation.ja: すると魔法のサンゴが 目を覚まし

translation.en: and chased the oysters away shouting--
translation.ja: 牡蠣(かき)を追い払った

translation.en: - Ooh, that was really scary. - Thank you.
translation.ja: すごく怖かった ありがとう

translation.en: How do you find exotic yarn?
Oh, I've got my secrets, you know? I'm a big city lady.
translation.ja: それは内緒 でも私は今や都会っ子なの

translation.en: Tell me you didn't make the goat more pajamas. All he does is eat them.
translation.ja: もうヤギにパジャマを あげないでよ

translation.en: Yes, but he likes eating pajamas.
she lives a really long time,
translation.ja: その後 長生きした

translation.en: long enough to test even an elephant's memory.
translation.ja: 記憶力の限界を迎えるまでね

translation.en: But of course, she never forgets Peter.
translation.ja: でもピーターのことは 忘れなかった
忘れられるわけないわ
